checkDoesNotApply.description: Debug information to show when the resource is a data URI
checkDoesNotApply.message: Check does not apply for data URI: $1

customRequestFailed.description: Debug information to show when the custom request fails
customRequestFailed.message: Custom request to generate error response failed for: ${targetURL}

hintDoesNotApply.description: Debug information to show when the hint doesn't apply for targeted browsers
hintDoesNotApply.message: Hint does not apply for targeted browsers

responseWithStatus.description: Report message when the error page is under the threshold
responseWithStatus.message: Response with status code $1 should have more than $2 bytes.
